Package sudoku

Class GameLogic

java.lang.Object
sudoku.GameLogic
public class GameLogic extends Object
Manages the logical component of the game by validating puzzles and checking for completion

      public static boolean checkSquares​(int[][] board)
      Determines if every sub-grid on the puzzle board is valid
      Parameters:
      board - An array representing the puzzle grid
      Returns:
      True if no duplicates found in all sub-grids false otherwise

    • checkOneSquare

      public static boolean checkOneSquare​(int[][] board, int startRow, int startColumn)
      Determines if one single sub-grid is valid Mainly used as a helper method for checkSquares
      Parameters:
      board - An array representing the puzzle grid
      startRow - The starting row of a sub-grid on the board
      startColumn - The starting column of a sub-grid on the board
      Returns:
      True if no duplicates found in all sub-grids false otherwise

    • comparePuzzleBoard

      public static boolean comparePuzzleBoard​(int[][] a, int[][] b)
      Method used for comparing two puzzle boards given as 2D int arrays
      Parameters:
      a - 2D int array of a puzzle board
      b - 2D int array of a puzzle board
      Returns:
      True if every digit is the same false otherwise
